game.name: MATRESHKA
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: MATRESHKA는 1인칭 심리 호러 체험으로, 오래된 소련 건물의 미로를 엘리베이터로 탐험하며 탈출 방법을 찾아야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MATRESHKA is a first-person psychological horror experience, you need find a way to escape from a maze of old soviet building. If you die...
